description: High-performance, headless, locale-aware CSV import toolkit for JavaScript/TypeScript. Parse, validate, map columns with fuzzy matching, locale-aware date/number/currency processing, compiled validators, and bitmap error tracking. Includes a headless React hook.
rules: Always import from '@elekcsv/core' for parse/validate/map functions
Always import from '@elekcsv/react' for the useCSVImporter hook
Use parse() for CSV parsing - it returns { headers, rows, rowCount, fieldCount }
Define a schema with columns: Record<string, ColumnDef> before validation
Use mapColumns() for automatic header-to-schema matching with fuzzy support
Use validate() for standard validation or validateBitmap() for large datasets (10K+ rows)
For locale-aware validation, set locale in schema: { locale: 'tr', columns: {...} }
Available locales: tr, en, en-GB, de, fr - use registerLocale() for custom ones
Pipeline shortcut: mapAndValidate(data, schema) does mapping + validation in one call
elek is headless - it has no UI. @elekcsv/react provides hooks, you bring your own components
Column types: string, number, integer, date, boolean, enum, phone, currency
Rules: required, email, unique, min, max, minLength, maxLength, pattern, enum, custom
